message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $100. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $97. It's a great price for a product of this quality, and I think you'll really appreciate it.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $92?
